mia

I’m Miriam, a cross-media artist – often creating music & theater & websites, or teaching CSS. These days, I’m also into yarn and pottery and mechanical clocks.

People are queer. We fall between meanings, and explore outside them. We grasp at stability and form, but always come up short.

I was told that every home page should be selling something. But I have a bu$ine$$ web$ite for that.

» Hello. I am a Miriam(Bot). Beep boop boop beep. Clock Escapement. Cascading Styles. Ned Ludd was right. Join a union.

Miriam Eric Suzanne

is a.k.a. terrible mia

has three first names, but only one comes first

is pretty anxious about this, honestly

wants to sell you something (anything)

if you’re looking for my bio, that’s on a different page

you can’t be one thing forever
